typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		CustomerKey as long,
		CustomerAlternateKey as string,
		FullName as string,
		BirthDate as date,
		MaritalStatus as string,
		Gender as string,
		EmailAddress as string,
		YearlyIncome as long,
		TotalChildren as long,
		NumberChildrenAtHome as long,
		Education as string,
		Occupation as string,
		HouseOwnerFlag as long,
		NumberCarsOwned as long,
		Address as string,
		Phone as string,
		DateFirstPurchase as date,
		CommuteDistance as string,
		City as string,
		StateProvinceName as string,
		CountryRegionName as string,
		PostalCode as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> DimCustomerADLSource
source(output(
		CustomerKey as long,
		CustomerAlternateKey as string,
		FullName as string,
		BirthDate as date,
		MaritalStatus as string,
		Gender as string,
		EmailAddress as string,
		YearlyIncome as long,
		TotalChildren as long,
		NumberChildrenAtHome as long,
		Education as string,
		Occupation as string,
		HouseOwnerFlag as long,
		NumberCarsOwned as long,
		Address as string,
		Phone as string,
		DateFirstPurchase as date,
		CommuteDistance as string,
		City as string,
		StateProvinceName as string,
		CountryRegionName as string,
		PostalCode as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DimCustomerSQLSource
DimCustomerADLSource, DimCustomerSQLSource join(DimCustomerADLSource@CustomerKey == DimCustomerSQLSource@CustomerKey,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 aggregate(groupBy(DimCustomerADLSource@Education,
		DimCustomerSQLSource@Occupation),
	AvgYearIncome = avg(DimCustomerSQLSource@YearlyIncome),
		FirstDateFirstPurchase = first(DimCustomerSQLSource@DateFirstPurchase),
		Count = count(DimCustomerADLSource@CustomerKey)) ~> Aggregate1
Aggregate1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
